{{also|糢糊}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|t2=糢糊|alt=模胡,麻糊,蠻糊}}

===Etymology===
Etymology unclear. A literal derivation is unlikely. First attested in the {{w|Tang Dynasty}}. If not a loanword from an Altaic language, it is likely that this is a disyllabic derivative of the Old Chinese root *''m̥aŋ''/''m̥oŋ''/''m̥ɯŋ'' ("unclear, confused"), which had numerous descendants, for example {{zh-l|盲|to be blind}}, {{zh-l|茫|boundless and indistinct}}, {{zh-l|蒙|darkness}}, {{zh-l|夢|dream}}, {{zh-l|昏|dim, confused}}. Compare {{zh-l|馬虎|careless}}, {{zh-l|麻胡|máhú|a mythical ferocious character}}, {{zh-l|瑪呼|mǎhū|(to put on) a mask}}, {{zh-l|糊塗|hútu|confused, obfuscated}}.

===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to [[blur]]; to [[confuse]]; to [[mix up]]
#: {{zh-x|別 模糊{hu} 這 兩 個 成語 之間 的 差別。|Don't '''mix up''' the differences between these two idioms.}}

===Adjective===
{{zh-adj}}

# [[blurry]]; [[vague]]; [[obscure]]; [[fuzzy]]
#: {{zh-x|我 的 電腦 屏幕 突然 變得 模糊{hu} 不清。|My computer screen suddenly went '''blurry'''.}}

===Adverb===
{{zh-adv}}

# [[vaguely]]; [[dimly]]
#: {{zh-x|我 '''@模模糊{hu}糊{hu}''' 記得 他 的 樣子{zi}。|I '''vaguely''' remember what he looked like.}}
